TEXT.BODY: Qtr ends Jan 31 Shr four cts vs 12 cts Net 102,508 vs 264,910 Revs 2,278,083 vs 2,536,312 Nine mths Shr 18 cts vs 15 cts Net 489,253 vs 404,877 Revs 6,679,745 vs 6,613,551 NOTE: Excludes discontinued operations gain of 40,519 dlrs in the third quarter fiscal 1986, and loss of 9,666 dlrs in the nine months fiscal 1986.
